第 26 章 X Terminal

目录

26.1. tsclient - Terminal Server Client supporting XDMCP, VNC and RDP
26.1.1. VNC
26.1.2. xdmcp
26.2. vinagre - a remote desktop viewer for the GNOME Desktop
26.3. rdesktop - A Remote Desktop Protocol client
26.3.1. -g: desktop geometry (WxH)
26.3.2. -f: full-screen mode
26.3.3. -A: enable SeamlessRDP mode
26.3.4. -z: enable rdp compression
26.3.5. -r: enable specified device redirection (this flag can be repeated)
26.4. TightVNC

26.1. tsclient - Terminal Server Client supporting XDMCP, VNC and RDP

26.1.1. VNC

让tsclient支持vnc协议

sudo apt-get install xtightvncviewer

26.1.2. xdmcp

让tsclient支持xdmcp协议

sudo apt-get install xnest
